title: Slider Game.
description: A digital clickable puzzle based on those old plastic childrens toys.
highlights: Coded in React, Timer incorporation, Multi-modes: numbers and picture:

title: Bee-Z Street.
description: A full-stack MERN app or creating native plant gardens.

title: Divas Game
description: A musical diva themed hang-man style game written in JavaScript
highlights: Written completely in JavaScript, the game includes a message board and YouTube video rewards.

title: Triva Game
description: A'World Cities' themed bar-style trivia game.
highlights: JavaScript, jQuery, and the use of JS-timers to present the questions in a slide-show fashion.
